text: @stonecold2050 You know Roy Blunt, and Josh Hawley are beaming with Pride, when they see these pictures. Gov. Parson, also this must make your heart swell w pride, and to think they did this as our CoVid19 are increasing. Doubt this will cause them to Decrease! All this under your leadership.
